short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A collection of essential developers tools needed everyday.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As Developers we need simple tools to help us be more productive, JSON Encoder, URL Decoder, PHP unserializer, 
Markdown preview, MD5 encoder to generate app secrets, HTML entities tables...etc.

this application goal is to contain them all in one place, this chrome app is a launcher to the original application on http://www.blazeboy.me/devtools 

this project is an open source project and you can send bug reports and feature requests to 
https://github.com/emad-elsaid/devtools
